function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Educate about the importance of physical distancing and adherence to safety measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Thorough testing, maintenance, and monitoring of air purification systems and antimicrobial materials.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Subsidizing and capital injection","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote awareness and accessibility for older residents, provide support and training for technology use","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensuring proper ventilation, wearing masks in indoor settings with poor ventilation","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Deploy additional surveillance and monitoring systems, integrate with crowd management technologies, and implement a multi-tiered approach to identify and alert individuals without face masks.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing policies that promote proximity economies and place-based perspective, supporting small businesses, and addressing community needs.","category":"Social activities / facilitate social interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Consider contextual factors in the analysis and interpretation of results","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting sensitivity analyses and adjusting mobility parameters for infected individuals based on real-world data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Invest in research and development for human-centric iot solutions, prioritize human-focused design","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"3d-printed personal protective equipment","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop more green spaces in residential areas and improve transportation to existing green spaces","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporation of environmental resource and comfort criteria into certification standards","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict regulations and privacy policies, transparent use of data","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement blockchain-based method for privacy and security","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Clear communication of methodology, transparency in data reporting, and standardized benchmarks for comparison","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve sound insulation, establish quiet hours, promote respectful neighbor behavior.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increasing healthcare capacity, securing medical supplies, and implementing telemedicine","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Policies promoting fair competition, support for smes in technology implementation","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict travel protocols and border control measures","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Invest in data science expertise, establish robust data collection and analysis infrastructure, and ensure secure data storage.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conduct a sensitivity analysis using alternative cost estimation methods and consult healthcare economists for validation.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Development of methods to separate and assess the impact of individual npis","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Clear communication, enforcement of measures, and public education on the importance of compliance","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase frequency of air diffuser cleaning, incorporate complete sterilization sessions into preventive maintenance schedules, and use antibacterial sprays to disinfect air after use.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improving public awareness and understanding of the importance of compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Monitoring of agglomerations","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enhancing investment in training and education of local researchers, strengthening their role in international projects, and reducing reliance on international researchers.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Explore alternative data collection methods","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Developing strategies to maintain essential clinical services while managing the covid-19 pandemic, utilizing digital technology for remote consultations and diagnostic procedures.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Meta-harmonization of common data standards, standardized processes","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adopt common data models such as phenopackets or ohdsi standards.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing purchase limits, ensuring transparent communication to the public on stock availability","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement virtual property viewings and digital signing to enable transactions during lockdown","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Installation of mixing fans or ensuring moderate ventilation and air mixing in the room","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Localizing supply chains, investment in domestic production, and technological innovation for energy infrastructure","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing effective ventilation and air quality control measures, rethinking building design strategies","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Providing resources and support, clear communication of guidelines, ensuring access to essential services","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Improve data collection methods, validate estimates with multiple sources, and use advanced statistical analysis techniques","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Providing mental health support, clear guidelines, and financial assistance during and post-quarantine","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing virus mitigation measures, promoting vaccination among workers, and enhancing on-site medical facilities.","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in research infrastructure, promote data-sharing initiatives, and support rapid evidence generation and dissemination","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Foster ontology interoperability and collaboration among developers.","category":"Facilitate
